hero.title: Support initiatives and referendums
hero.description: Try E-Collecting now to digitally support initiatives and referendums. Use the federal Beta-ID for popular votes. No personal data is stored.

infoBox.title: E-Collecting Pilot Project
infoBox.description: This website is a non-profit project of civil society. Our goal is to support initiatives and referendums safely, digitally and accessibly with the new e-ID.
infoBox.eidDescription: The e-ID is issued by the state. It complements the physical identity card and is free. On September 28, the population votes on the proposal.
infoBox.swiyuDescription: This pilot project uses the Confederation's Beta Credential Service. To participate, a Beta-ID must be created via the swiyu-Wallet app. The project exclusively uses fictional templates and the Confederation's Beta-ID. No personal data is stored.

download.title: Download
download.description: Download the swiyu app for free from the Google Play Store or Apple Store.

steps.1: 1. Start the application process for the Beta-ID.
steps.2: 2. Select the fictional attributes of your Beta-ID.
steps.3: 3. Add the Beta-ID to your swiyu app.

footer.projectDescription: The pilot project started in December 2024. It aims to make signature collection for popular votes digital, secure and accessible - as a complement to paper. This pilot tests a possible variant of E-Collecting via the Confederation's Beta-ID. Behind the non-profit project are the Digital Democracy Hub Switzerland and the Foundation for Direct Democracy.

purpose.description: This platform is a fictional pilot project for the electronic collection of declarations of intent for popular votes. All contents and functions of this site, including services, are intended for demonstration purposes only and have no legal validity.

privacy.title: Privacy
